wikipedia_page.main:
Paul Erangey (18 September 1966 – 1 April 2004) was a British actor.
Erangey had his first experience as actor in 1979 when he played in the British production of Penmarric as young Marcus. He became famous all over Europe after he starred in Brendon Chase as Harold Hensman.
In 1982 he finished his career as a young actor. He died in 2004; he was 37 years old.

response: The Hensman brothers were played by Craig McFarlane (Robin), Howard Taylor (John) and Paul Erangey (Harold). Aunt Ellen is played by Rosalie Crutchley and Smokoe Joe by Paul Curran. Police Sergeant Bunting is played by Michael Robbins and the Reverend Whiting by Christopher Biggins. The new character Monica Hurling is played by Liza Goddard.
